Given a sentence, output the part of speech of all the words. here is an example: the quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog. the part of speech tagging result is: the (determiner) quick (adjective) brown (adjective) fox (noun) jumps (verb) over (preposition) the (determiner) lazy (adjective) dog (noun).

Given a sentence, output the tense of all the words. here is an example: she walked to the store yesterday. the tense tagging result is: she (pronoun) walked (verb) to (preposition) the (determiner) store (noun) yesterday (adverb).
